name: Tetris Shooter (Mults)
description:
This game is a combination of the classic Tetris with a shooter game. You can't move the pieces, you can only move the player using the arrows. Fire bullets with the Z key and destroy some blocks to organize the field just like in tetris.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows - Move Player

Z - Shoot

Based on the project made my OneLoneCoder:

Code-It-Yourself! Tetris - Programming from Scratch (Quick and Simple C++)
